ygData.subject: Re: Manasong during battle.
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve gone from begging 0 to begging 48 with my rogue without getting a single copper...of course, maybe if I wasn t begging from trees it would help...it might
ygData.messageBody:
I've gone from begging 0 to begging 48 with my rogue without getting a
single copper...of course, maybe if I wasn't begging from trees it would
help...it might also help if I wasn't attacking them while begging, also....
----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 4:13 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Manasong during battle.


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> Begging can definitely improve even when you fail. I went from begging 0
to
> begging 5 and never got a single cp. Of course maybe that was just
because
> the boat was 'Broke' at the time. ;-)
>
> Kitasi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Peck White [mailto:peck_white@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, November 30, 1999 1:25 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Manasong during battle.
>
>
> From: Peck White <peck_white@...>
>
> You can also beg the boat on the trip across the OOT.
>
> Tomerrilin
> Bard of the 14th Song
> Mith Marr
>
> --- Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...> wrote:
> > >From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
> > >
> > > > Speaking of Instill Doubt, it appears it does
> > not cap at 75 like I had
> > > > heard, got mine to 78 last night!
> > >
> > > What's the secret to get it up faster? I swear,
> > I have practiced
> > > it for hours on end while just waiting for a
> > rare spawn, or camping
> > > some obscure item - and I have gotten it to 35,
> > but it will not go
> > > any higher. In that same time I got my begging
> > to 20, and my bind
> > > wound to 15. Something must be up.
> > >
> > > Harmonic.
> >
> > Both ID and Begging are skills that only get a
> > chance to increase if you are
> > successful. Once you get ID (and I assume Beg) over
> > 50 it goes up fairly
> > fast and is actually useful when solo'ing. When
> > solo'ing with ID I will
> > start using hitting it when the target is under 50%
> > and I have successfully
> > chained it, as it will turn and not move :) Giving
> > you several free shots.
> > You can practice ID on anything (corpses, players,
> > pets, etc..) Beg can be
> > practiced on pets.
> >
> > The best way I found to raise Bind Wounds (mine is
> > maxed at 100) was to get
> > a backpack full of bandages and go to a crowded
> > low-level dungeon
> > (Blackburrow is great for this) and shout out free
> > wound binding at zone.
> > All the melee solo'ist will come and help you raise
> > your skill.
> >
> > Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
> >
> > EQ Bard Song Analysis
> > http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
> >
> >
